text:
="preserve">Malcolm Lawrence "Mal" Pascoe (31 March 1933 – 24 August 2020) was an Australian rules footballer and coach. He played 94 senior Victorian Football League (VFL) games for the Essendon Football Club from 1953 to 1958, and played 177 senior Tasmanian Australian National Football League (TANFL) games for the Hobart Football Club from 1959 to 1966.
Pascoe died in Tasmania on 24 August 2020 at the age of 87.
